EmailTemplate.description: For use in sending quote for approval - second message
EmailTemplate.name: Quote Approval Required Second
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Quotation {!Case.Quote_Number__c} Your Ref. {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c} Reminder:Approval Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
As a reminder, we still have not received your approval for the subject repair. Please find attached Honeywell Quotation {!Case.Quote_Number__c}. Approve your quotation by going to the My Aerospace Web Portal.
You may also approve or deny the quote by sending an email to cpsquotesapprovals@honeywell.com or by sending a fax to (602)-822-9213. If responding via email or fax you must include the following information:
A signed copy of the quote document
Written reference the quote number, the amount approved, and the either the word Approved or Denied
A funded PO for the amount of the quotation
For quote denials, please specify Return-As-Is or Scrap On-Site.
For faster service, please do NOT copy multiple email addresses on your approval/denial.
Thank you, {!User.Signature1__c}
The information in this message is privileged and/or confidential and is tended only for the use of the individual(s) named above. This message cannot be forwarded without permission from your Honeywell contact.
This message is received in error or otherwise by someone other than the addressee, please destroys the message.
